Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=8.6 µg/ml), Bacillus pyocyaneus CMCCB 10104 (MIC=8.6 µg/ml).Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=8.6 µg/ml).Fungi:Candida albicans (MIC=17.2 µg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22029824] It shows no hemolytic activity against human red blood cells at the concentration of 50 μg/mL.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Extremely abundant antimicrobial peptides existed in the skins of nine kinds of Chinese odorous frogs.
Literature.Author: Yang X, Lee WH, Zhang Y.
